:: Rainchark ::

:: Rainchark turns around to be meeted with a face full of flames.  
After a few seconds of minor damage, Rainchark fires one missle at 
Pyrotaur, and flies away from the flames.  Rainchark's optics had 
been minorly damaged, but he could still see.  Rainchark flies 
towards some minor cover, and activates a com-link with Shockwave ::

Commander, we are greatly outnumbered.  Shouldn't we retreat!?!

:: Fires 4 laser blasts at Trainwreck ::
